item.description:
Are you a nonprofit that is looking to network with business professionals? Are you a business that works exclusively in the nonprofit sector? Are you looking to grow partnerships to strengthen the social sector? Are you looking to learn, share and collaborate with more nonprofits and businesses? Are you a creative business owner or employee open to share new ideas with other socially responsible people?

If you answered YES to any of these questions this unique Meetup is for you! The purpose of the group is to produce new learning opportunities build on successes, to build deeper collaboration, and build stronger relationships to speed positive change for the social sector. Meet other social entrepreneurs and local leaders who work to better the social impact of the nonprofit sector. The more nonprofits and business can collaborate to solve problems the better!

2010 Testimonial:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6b20_ZHxlJs

2009 Testimonials:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PYiuQ8gFX24

“I met some great people who were willing to share ideas and thoughts. Everyone wants to help - it really is a win/win situation. ” - Danielle

“A good group of experienced professionals with diversified expertise but one thing in common: enthusiasm for social changes. Clear agenda, well organized meeting. People are genuinely willing to help each other. I can see great ideas forming and real collaborations happening. ” - Jing

Jobs In Nonprofits LinkedIn group:
http://www.linkedin.com/groups?about=&gid=1814873&amp...

item.name: Social Impact Success Community Meetup Group
